title: Troubleshooting Valve Issues Using A Voltmeter

tasks.task: Troubleshooting a malfunctioning sprinkler zone using a voltmeter.
subtasks: Identify the type of malfunction (zone not stopping, not coming on, or not coming on fully).
Check if the controller is working properly by measuring voltage.
Test the solenoid's resistance using the multimeter.
Check for wiring issues if resistance is outside the acceptable range.
Inspect the valve's condition and solenoid using a multimeter.
Replace faulty components such as wiring, valves, or solenoids as necessary.
